source.1d017d68:
automl = AutoML(
    algorithms=["CatBoost", "Xgboost", "LightGBM"],
    model_time_limit=10*60,
    start_random_models=3,
    hill_climbing_steps=3,
    top_models_to_improve=3,
    golden_features=True,
    features_selection=False,
    stack_models=True,
    train_ensemble=True,
    explain_level=0,
    validation_strategy={
        "validation_type": "kfold",
        "k_folds": 4,
        "shuffle": False,
        "stratify": True,
    }
)
automl.fit(X, y)
